document_data.caption: A map showing the Swords' Rest (labeld #1) at the end of Telshambra's Street.
document_data.name: Swords' Rest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Swords' Rest''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The tavern stood one story tall.
document_data.Location: The Swords' Rest was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] on the east side of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] where it was intersected by [[Telshambra's Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dock South Ward}}
document_data.Activities: The tavern was a good place to hire [[mercenaries]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Elgorel]] was the bartender at the Swords' Rest.
